attributes.action: A E-Petition To Save The South Yorkshire Police Helicopter And Not Sharing With Leeds and Derbyshire
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the government to not take away the helicopters from the South Yorkshire Police and make our county share with surrounding forces which will make us less safe for us all.

This petition is for anyone that wishes to keep their families and cities save from more crime which leaving counties like South Yorkshire an open ground from lawlessness.
